lexUnit.name: target.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an objective or result towards which efforts are directed

sentence.text: Discharges from refining and use of oil fell from 300,000 tonnes in 1980 to 60,000 tonnes in 1992 , exceeding targets for the reduction of emissions by 2000 .
